name: Fix KeyError in Cell 2
prompt: Cell 2 of this notebook raises a KeyError because it references a column 'revenue_usd' that does not exist. Fix the code so that it correctly computes the 'profit' column using the actual column names available in the DataFrame.

setup.description: Notebook with a KeyError in cell 2 due to incorrect column name 'revenue_usd'. The correct column name is 'revenue'.
